title: Forest
description: A dense forest. The soil beneath the debris layer is rich and dark, with white fungal strands visible through out. The sky is almostly completely obscured by branches and leaves. Leaves, sticks, and other debris litters the ground. The land is gently sloped up to the north, gently sloped down to the east, gently sloped down to the south, gently sloped down to the west.
